    • Field Detail

      • drinks

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> drinks
        ArrayList filled by drinks available to buy, empty by default. Filled by calling updatData(user)

      • ingredients

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> ingredients
        ArrayList filled by ingredients available to buy, empty by default. Filled by calling updatData(user)

      • products

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> products
        ArrayList filled by products, empty by default. Filled by calling updatData(user)

      • price

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> price
        HashMap filled by prices, empty by default. Keys is product names, values is prices Filled by calling updatData(user)

      • buy

        public static boolean buy(User user,
                          java.lang.String product,
                          int amount)
        Removing amount products from database if user can pay for it
        Parameters:
        user - instance of User
        product - name of product
        amount - amount of products
        Returns:
        true if operation successful, false if have not enough product or user have not enough money

      • addNewProduct

        public static boolean addNewProduct(User admin,
                                    java.lang.String product,
                                    boolean drink)
        Adding new product to database
        Parameters:
        admin - valid user instance with admin rights
        product - name of product
        drink - indicator is it a drink or not
        Returns:
        true if operation successful, false user is not administrator
